statements: DELETE FROM public_transport WHERE location_lat > 40.0 AND status = 'active';
DELETE FROM public_transport WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND status = 'Active';
DELETE FROM public_transport WHERE location_lat > 40.0 OR (vehicle_type = 'Bus' AND status = 'Inactive');
DELETE FROM vehicle_statuses WHERE status = 'In Service';
DELETE FROM public_transport_vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND status = 'Active';
DELETE FROM vehicle_statuses WHERE vehicle_id = 456 AND status = 'Under Maintenance' AND status_update_datetime < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM VehicleLocation WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM RouteSchedule WHERE departure_time < '2022-01-01 08:00:00' AND arrival_time > '2022-01-01 18:00:00';
DELETE FROM status_history WHERE vehicle_id = 101 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
